text:
@freethinkingchk @FreeBMe @HillaryClinton He's responsible for a lot of them because he learned about Coronavirus in January and waited until the end of March to do anything about it.

There's a reason we're the ONLY developed nation that isn't able to control the outbreak: we have a shitty, idiotic, unqualified leader
